channel.title: Can some 1 help me with a few things i wanna do with my server?
channel.description:
Well the things i wanna know how to do on my serer are.
1. Be able to change the prices of items in the stores
2. Be able to set a tele command like ::legends (takes u to legends guild)
3. is there a way to delet doors so you could walk past them?
4. when you talk to a npc can u make them say waht you want?
i got npcs in a good area through out falador, lummy, cammy, ardy, varrock, khrayl, mage arena, but i want more open for my members like the desert and easie access to areas[br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2007, 04:30:22 PM[/size][hr]i know you can do ::tele (x cord),(ycord) dostn work for everyone

item.title: Can some 1 help me with a few things i wanna do with my server?
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

ok i know all these rofl…

  1. to changed prices, you gotta go into items.cfg and search for the item you want to change and the first three numbers to the right of that number you change to your price… pretty easy…

  2. to be able to set tele commands you first gotta know where all of your test frame commands are (after them are the beginning of commands) (or you could just find a tele command and after the end of the last } add your command) If you need help on making the command, PM me and i’ll help you out

3.To delete doors, you gotta do fedexers “delete object” tut and you can simply do that but changing the delete object to delete door or w e… you may need some coding experience to do the tutorial since like all of fedexer’s tuts are adding voids and you may not know how to add them

  1. This is a hard tutorial to make a message come up when you click “talk to” difficulty is like 8/10 because for 1 NPC it probally takes forever to develope!!!

Hope ive sort of helped you out for 1. and 2. not so much on 3. and 4. because you gotta add some stuff in order to use…

-Zaron

Read full topic
